name: Super Duper Ship 2
description:
Super Duper Ship 2 is a fast paced slow motion space shooter with a twist: you can't shoot! Use your superior maneuverability to dodge and evade your enemies to make them destroy themselves. Combines the slow motion mechanics of Super Hot with classic overhead arcade games.

This is an early access release! Full game is still a work in progress. Please leave any feedback you have here, or follow me on Twitter @tripletakegames

Features:

  • 5 challenging levels that will make you scream!
  • 4 unlockable power-ups, like teleport and shields!
  • Amazing 1 song soundtrack!
  • Several exciting sound effects!
  • Particle effects that will blow your socks off!
  • IT'S FREE!
